fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Sow (Night): Plant a mint plant at a target's home. It takes a day to activate, but will provide Powerful defense.
-Self Destruct (Night): Destroy all mint plants that you have set up, also preventing the targets from being visited.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If a minted target is attacked, you may choose between Self Destructing all of them, or simply letting them die.
